mapper.sql: id, cid, city, PM2, AQI, quality, PM10, CO, NO2, O3, SO2, time, createtime, main

order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: SELECT MAX(a.pm2) pm2,MAX(a.aqi) aqi,MAX(a.quality) quality,MAX(a.pm10) pm10, MAX(a.co) co,MAX(a.no2) no2,MAX(a.o3) o3,MAX(a.so2) so2,DATE_FORMAT(a.`time`,'%h:00') `time` FROM tb_data a
